Reviews.Content: wonderful time march 2011 flew day earthquake tsunami japan operating normally resort time arrived youre looking fancy resortlike atmosphere lots activity noise wouldnt prefer quiet laidback accommodations perfect gorgeous granite countertops living furniture appliances comfortable bedding etc front bedroom wonderful sliding glass door left night hear ocean bedroom huge comfy king bed able watch whales lanai giant sea turtles steps beach name drawback wasnt beach front resort rarely stayed condo day instead doing activities offsite wasnt handy able quickly walk nearby shopping food including convenience store senor frogs snorkeling equipment coffee shop etc definitely stay resort
